Ho Chi Minh City People's Committee held a conference to announce the
establishment of the city's Department of Food Safety.
Ho Chi Minh City is also the
first locality in the country to have a department-level
administrative unit in charge of
ensuring food safety at the
Ho Chi Minh City Department of Food Safety.
In operation from
January 2024, the department's predecessor is the
Ho Chi Minh City Food Safety Management Board, which has operated for 6 years
as a pilot model, only
that we imported the force.  regarding
food safety of all three Departments of Agriculture,
Health and Industry and Trade, only then will we have enough
resources to be able to arrange
food safety teams in the districts.
We will further promote
cooperation.  With the high-tech
food traceability association, this is very
suitable for a big city like
Ho Chi Minh City. We hope
that after establishing this department, it will
legalize everything.  On the issues that
we have just piloted recently,
city leaders consider the establishment of the
Ho Chi Minh City Department of Food Safety
to be a breakthrough in the process of
soft development and ensuring
social security.  Taking the goal of protecting people's health
as a guideline for action
in accordance with Ho Chi Minh City's policies
and the local practical situation.

Green floods are occurring in many parts

Chile has just welcomed a new member,
a baby boy weighing more than 7 kg, according to
doctors. This may be the largest newborn baby
born in
Chile. The baby weighs exactly  7.15 kg and was
born via cesarean section due to a
complicated health condition so the baby is
in special care and the mother also
has to admit that my current emotions are
mixed. The doctors said that it was a
boy.  I am the same size as a
1 year old child. This is rare and
practically unheard of in Chile. The
heaviest known baby was
6.7 kg. Babies born larger than
average.  often at high risk of
hypoglycemia, jaundice and polycythemia,
the baby was born on the morning of December 28
at a hospital in the town of Cura nilah
Hue and had to be transferred to
another hospital due to problems.
The mother's current health is still in the hospital in Cura Nilah
and is waiting to be reunited with her baby. According to
doctors, the baby's condition is stable
and is being monitored at the special care area
for newborns in the square.

We bring flowers and honor her

B listens to them  The worship of yemanja

is a central deity in
canom religion often depicted as a

is the mother of many other gods and that

in which the ringleader

Fortune restaurant, has organized
